Returns: true to create and return a @B_android#graphics#drawable#Drawable_E@ or @B_android#graphics#Bitmap_E@ with partial data. false (which is the default) to abort the decode and throw e. Any undecoded lines in the image will be blank.
Parameters: ImageDecoder.DecodeException: exception containing information about the decode interruption. This value must never be null.
onPartialImage(android.graphics.ImageDec.Description: Called by @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder_E@ when there is only a partial image to display. If decoding is interrupted after having decoded a partial image, this method will be called. The implementation can inspect the @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#DecodeException_E@ and optionally finish the rest of the decode creation process to create a partial @B_android#graphics#drawable#Drawable_E@ or @B_android#graphics#Bitmap_E@.

ClassDesc: Interface for inspecting a @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#DecodeException_E@ and potentially preventing it from being thrown. If an instance is passed to @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#setOnPartialImageListener_E@, a @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#DecodeException_E@ that would otherwise have been thrown can be inspected inside @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#OnPartialImageListener#onPartialImage_E@. If @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#OnPartialImageListener#onPartialImage_E@ returns true, a partial image will be created.
